info.+content: Sakura, la caçadora de cartes: Les cartes transparents
カードキャプターさくら クリアカード編

Sakura and Syaoran are starting junior high school. With the Final Judgment passed, Sakura thinks school life will be quiet, but then all her cards suddenly turn blank. The mysterious new power she discovers will change how she thinks about her powers. (from manga)
